mapper.select: select r.sub_code, s.subj_name, s.subj_code from registration r join subject s on r.sub_code=substr(s.subj_code, 5) where r.stu_no=#{stuNo}
mapper.insert: insert into assignment(assign_no, stu_no, file_name, file_size, original_file_name) values(#{assignNo}, #{stuNo}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{originalFileName})
